sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词均可表示"虽然，尽管"之意。
means: though和although在意义上几乎毫无区别，但文体上后者是较正式用词，语气比though强。此外，在习惯用法上这两个词仍有以下一些差异：1.though可引出倒装语序的让步状语从句，although 则不能。2.though可与even连用，although则不能；在as though结构中，只用though，不能用although。3.though可以置于从句末，而although则不能。4.引出省略句时，通常用though。
as ： 引出让步状语从句只用于倒装语序结构中，语气强于上述两个连词。

sentence.Network_en: Although he was only grumbling, his choice of words made Rodney angry.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管他只是在咕哝，可是他的措词却让罗德妮恼火。

sentence.Network_en: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。

sentence.Network_en: Although people sometimes buy property sight unseen, it'sa remarkably bad idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管人们有时没看房就买了房，但这真是一个很糟糕的主意。

list.abs: shell and intrusive viruses most commonly attack executable program flies － those with a. corn or. exe extension , although data flies are also at some risk .外壳型和入侵型病毒通常攻击可执行文件，即带有.COM或.EXE扩展名的文件。当然数据文件也有受攻击的危险

although China's export slowdown , but the pattern of trade surplus likely to continue after 2010 , the import and export foreign exchange market will continue to supply more than demand .虽然我国出口增速放缓，但贸易顺差格局可能会延续到2010年以后，进出口市场外汇供给依然会超过需求。
尽管我们已经长大了,可是我们的父母仍把我们看作小孩.although, though 辨析although 不能though 那样用作副词, 放在句末表示强调时要用even
although it is generally agreed that this wine is superior to that one , few wish to pay so much money for it .虽然人们公认这种酒较之那种质地优良，但很少有人花这么多钱去买它。
although it may seem that being in such a famous band would open him doors to fame , no one believed he might be popular in a solo career .尽管人们认为跻身于这样一个有名的乐队会为他打开声望的大门，但没有人相信他会在独唱生涯中取得成功。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from all(as an adverb) + though

entry.def: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which contains a statement which contrasts with the statement in the main clause.

example.ex: Although he is known to only a few, his reputation among them is very great...
example.tran: 虽然知道他的人不多，但他在这些人中名声却很响。

example.ex: Although the shooting has stopped for now, the destruction left behind is enormous.
example.tran: 虽然枪战目前已停止，但造成的破坏是巨大的。

entry.tran: 虽然（表示惊奇或出乎意料）
entry.def: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which contains a statement which makes the main clause of the sentence seem surprising or unexpected.

example.ex: Although I was only six, I can remember seeing it on TV...
example.tran: 虽然那时我只有6岁，我依然记得在电视上见过它。

example.ex: Although he was twice as old as us, he became the life and soul of the company.
example.tran: 虽然他的年纪是我们的两倍，但他却成为了公司的灵魂人物。

entry.def: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which gives some information that is relevant to the main clause but modifies the strength of that statement.

example.ex: He was in love with her, although he did not put that name to it.
example.tran: 他爱着她，虽然他没有将其称为爱。

entry.tran: 尽管;虽然（表示承认所述是事实）
entry.def: You use although when admitting a fact about something which you regard as less important than a contrasting fact.

example.ex: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style...
example.tran: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。

example.ex: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.
example.tran: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。

sentences.sentence: "even though she knew the answer, she did not respond"

stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+most最多→adv.几乎, 差不多
al全部+ready准备→全部准备好了
al全部+so如此→全部如此→也,同样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+together共同, 一起→adv.完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
al加强+though虽然→conj.虽然, 尽管

Sentence.sentence: And although you don't read about this much, the United States is also a large exporter of oil products, selling about 2 million barrels of petroleum products per day to about 90 countries.
Although many attribute Kodak's downfall to "complacency(自满) ," that explanation doesn't acknowledge the lengths to which the company went to reinvent itself.

Although Kodak anticipated the inevitable rise of digital photography, its corporate（企业的） culture was too rooted in the successes of the past for it to make the clean break necessary to fully embrace the future
Although most people admitted to some lingering rivalry, it was rarely strong enough to end the relationship.

We think this is the way the future is going to work," said Kyle Dickson, co-director of research and the mobile learning initiative at Abilene Christian University in Texas, which has bought more than 600 iPhones and 300 iPods for students Although plenty of students take their laptops to class, they don't take them everywhere and would prefer something lighter
Although that can indeed be frustrating, this is probably the only way to treat so grand a topic.

means.word_mean: 尽管, 虽然, 即使

sentences.en: Although my car is very old, it still runs very well.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车虽然很旧, 但仍然跑得很快。

sentences.en: Although they are poor they are happy.
sentences.cn: 虽然他们很穷, 但很快乐。

sentences.en: The high tax policy is certainly unpopular, although it's unlikely to meet the soaring armament expenditures.
sentences.cn: 高赋税政策肯定是不受欢迎的，但也未必能满足飞涨的军备开支。

jushi.english: They are generous, although they are poor.
jushi.chinese: 他们尽管穷,却十分慷慨。

jushi.english: Although he was ill, yet〔still, nevertheless〕 he managed to look careful.
jushi.chinese: 虽然他病了，但他尽力显出很注意的样子。

jushi.english: They are generous although they are poor.
